summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 4.1°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 695 m), and light levels (up 4825 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1643 m), and light levels (up 6793 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 694.7m lower than yesterday, 611.7m lower than the past week, 1642.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1029.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and bright intervals likely. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
